name: Kyoei
description:
Kyoei is a versus fighting game based on the bushido theme where players embody samurais at war.

You will need two players and two controllers to engage the fight. Two winning rounds of 90 seconds and the game is over. Also, you'll need to use the mouse during menus.

Kyoei is a game about vainglory, samurais are fighting for a cause that exceeds them. Even if they win, both sides are losing units. The purpose of the game is to not glorify the victory, because there is no victorious side in a war, but only a less losing one.
